title: Exploring the Impact of Microstructure on the Mechanical Properties of High-Strength Zn Coating For Biomedical Application
content: Zinc (Zn) is emerging as a promising candidate for biomedical applications due to its unique biodegradability and biocompatibility properties. This study explores the application of Zn as an antibacterial coating for implants, coupled with a tunable micro 3D-printed architected structure fabricated via template-assisted electrodeposition to enhance cell adhesion. This study focuses on the comprehensive characterization of a Zn coating synthesized through electrodeposition, a versatile and cost-efficient technique for producing diverse 2D and 3D coatings.
